trans-unit.source: Specifies the display behaviors that you can apply to the list item contents in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定可应用于列表项的内容中的显示行为<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The BulletedListDisplayMode enumeration represents the display behaviors that you can apply to the content of the list items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: BulletedListDisplayMode 枚举表示可应用于列表项中的内容的显示行为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A> property uses these enumeration values to set the display behavior of the list item content in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A>属性使用这些枚举值来设置列表显示行为中的内容项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A> property to the HyperLink value, the content of each list item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control renders as a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A>为超链接值属性，在每个列表项的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控件呈现为超链接。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Text value allows you to display the list item content as regular text with no additional functionality.
trans-unit.target: 文本值，可显示为常规文本的列表项内容，不含附加功能。

trans-unit.source: The HyperLink value allows you to display list item content as hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: 超链接值使你可以显示为超链接的列表项内容。

trans-unit.source: When clicked, a hyperlink navigates to a URL.
trans-unit.target: 单击时，超链接导航到 URL。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A> property to specify the URL that a hyperlink navigates to.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A>属性指定的超链接导航到的 URL。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The LinkButton value allows you to display list item content as link buttons.
trans-unit.target: LinkButton 值使你可以显示为链接按钮的列表项内容。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click?displayProperty=fullName> event to post back to the server when the user clicks a link button.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click?displayProperty=fullName>将回发到服务器，当用户单击的链接按钮的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the event data of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs> class to determine the index of the link button in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> that the user clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用事件数据的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs>类以确定索引中的链接按钮<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>用户单击。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Displays the list item content as hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: 显示为超链接的列表项内容。

trans-unit.source: Displays the list item content as link buttons.
trans-unit.target: 将列表项内容显示为链接按钮。

trans-unit.source: Displays the list item content as text.
trans-unit.target: 显示为文本列表项内容。
